title: Small Ventures to Greater Adventures
description: The poems have come from the authors heart and you will reflect and smile as you read through this book of your own past. It certainly brought back memories to the author. IT HAS BEEN FIVE STARRED ON AMAZON.CO.UK, with a great review given for this book. ONE OF THE POEMS IN THE BOOK A FAMILY CIRCLE There are always those moments sometimes, When we reflect those good times, Of what's happen during our life, How much different they are to now, Meeting that person who was to be, Your future husband or wife you see, When you got married on your wedding day, Having your children at their birth, To creating a family, and enjoying the life, As parents having fun with the children, Going through some hard times, When those children are in their teens, All those Christmases and birthdays together, Then there is that time, That the siblings want to fly, To adventure out alone, Into the big world, You find yourself at home together,
author: Peter Churchill
